data.text:
Published 7:07 am Wednesday, August 7, 2024

The Baltimore Orioles will look to Anthony Santander for continued success at the plate when they take the field against George Springer and the Toronto Blue Jays on Wednesday.

Watch MLB, other live sports and more on Fubo! Use our link to sign up for a free trial.

Orioles vs. Blue Jays Live Stream, TV Channel and Game Info

Date: Wednesday, August 7, 2024

Time: 7:07 PM ET

Location: Toronto, Ontario

Venue: Rogers Centre

TV Channel: MASN2

Live Stream: Watch this game on Fubo

Catch MLB action all season long on Fubo!.

Orioles Batting & Pitching Performance

The Baltimore Orioles average 1.5 home runs per game and have hit a league-high 175 home runs in total.

Baltimore is the top slugging team in MLB this season with a .452 slugging percentage.

The Orioles are sixth in MLB with a .255 batting average.

Baltimore is the third-highest scoring team in MLB action, averaging 5.1 runs per game (578 total).

The Orioles rank 10th in MLB with an on-base percentage of .319.

The Orioles’ 8.2 strikeouts per game rank 12th in the majors.

Baltimore has the 12th-ranked team ERA across all MLB pitching staffs (3.91).

The 8.6 strikeouts per nine innings put together by Baltimore’s pitching staff ranks 15th in the majors.

The Orioles have the 11th-ranked WHIP in MLB (1.231).

Place your bets on any MLB matchup at BetMGM, and sign up with our link for a first-time deposit bonus!

Orioles Probable Starting Pitcher

Trevor Rogers makes the start for the Orioles, his 23rd of the season. He is 2-10 with a 4.76 ERA and 88 strikeouts in 109 2/3 innings pitched.

In his last appearance on Thursday, the lefty went 4 1/3 innings against the Cleveland Guardians, allowing five earned runs while surrendering six hits.

Rogers has registered three quality starts this year.

Rogers will try to collect his 17th outing of five or more innings pitched this season. He’s averaging five innings per appearance.

He has made one appearance this season in which he did not allow an earned run.
